data.sentence: The word لَا comes from the root ل ا and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
data.sentence: The word يَصْلَاهَا comes from the root ص ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
